name: Destroy End
_source: s;Kajal;Traitors...{w}{br}Traitors, scum, villains.{w}{br}You do not know what you've done.
s;Kajal;Verstadt, you are a contemptable excuse for a lord.{w}{br}I... hope you all perish.
s;Titus;Well done, Simon.{w}{br}The Wandering Knights couldn't have dreamed of doing this alone.{w}{br}And with Vesner's corpse gone,{w} the swamp and surrounding lands will be much safer.
s;Simon;I hope so. And thanks for assisting, Titus.{w}{br}We really appreciated having you on board.

s;Titus;To be honest, I hope to continue traveling with you.{w}{br}Your group has been able to achieve a lot, and you've proven yourself as a leader.{w}{br}I truly believe that you're this world's best hope of restoring order.
s;Simon;Well, we'll be glad to have your assistance.
s;Simon;We'll be returning to Castle Morrissey soon to regroup,{w} and you're more than welcome to accompany us.
s;Titus;But take a moment to enjoy our victory here.{w}{br}This might not seem like much for you, but the Knights and I have been working toward this for a long time...
